features: ● Retro Table Lamps: Farmhouse finishes combined with minimalist design offer a new Nordic category that embraces simplicity as the ultimate in sophistication. The grey bedside table lamp body is designed according to the retro European maze board, and the unique design style is loved by the fashion lovers.

● Simple Bedroom Lamps: Unique design, classical without loss of artistic atmosphere, The retro bedside lamps designed with unique design for you need light well in many place, and our rustic table lamp especially suitable as your work lamps, reading light for your bedside table and nightstand, or as an accent light on top of end tables in your living room.

● PERFECT HOME DECOR & LIGHTS:Perfect as both decorative elements and sources of illumination for a end table or reading corner in the living room,or on a sideboard in the living room, companions for work or study on a desk, or guardians of our dreams as bedside lamps.

● SAFETY CHOICE:We use the finest materials to make the lamps become the essence of safety.We have been to the high standard system to constrain each production process, to ensure that every lamp is in line with the national quality and safety standards.
● CUSTOMER SATISFACTION:G-SAFAVA table lamps promised 2 years warranty. No matter what kind of problem you might meet, you are free to contact us and get our support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: really nice size lam erfect for the nightstand in the bedroom. its well made, very sturdy and has a good weight, even with a narrower base than i would have liked it stays upright with no issues even with bumps and fumbling to reach for the turn knob in the middle of the night. i got 1 lamp for free through the vine program and loved it so much i bought a second lamp after testing the the product for review so i would have a matching set in my bedroom. really nice design, sturdy, and easy to put together for a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some assembly required, but very cute!
reviews.reviewText: First, they must have updated the description on this since I ordered it, as I was lead to believe it was a 2-pack. I think for $50 it's a bit pricier than I would prefer based on this alone. Second, there was a small bit of assembly, which was fine, but unexpected. You have to tug the cord through the base, which at first is a bit intimidating because I worried I'd break it. But I worried for nothing, and then I was able to fit the harp and finial into the base. Third, the lamp shade comes rolled up inside out and it attaches via a strip of velcro. So unfortunately, that connection sticks out quite a bit. That said, we just turned the lamp so the seam was on the backside.Overall, I really love the ambiance it provides and it's really pretty and complements my decor. I do feel that $30-$40 would be a more appropriate price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I was expecting 2 lamps but only got 1. I was also expecting the lamp to be a bit smaller and to my surprise it was much nicer than I anticipated! It's a very sturdy base and the easy of putting it together took me only a few minutes. Packaging was on point too. I love the design on the lamp base too. It's very well made and sturdy. I expect to have this lamp for many years to come! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, nicely sized lamp
reviews.reviewText: I am using this lamp in my bedroom, and I love it.Just the right size for a bedroom table lamp, and very pretty. It's sturdy and solid, but not heavy.Assembly was quite easy- take the rolled up lampshade, open it and velcro the ends. Then insert the rings that shape it, and clip them in. Last, screw in the lamp socket holder. Could not be easier to assemble and takes only a few minutes.The result is a beautiful lamp, although you add your own e26 LED bulb to complete the project.The price point on this lamp is excellent, the lamp itself is lovely, certainly tall enough for a bedside table lamp, and it rates five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s cheap. It was a struggle to get the lampshade straight.I got what I paid for.Would I buy again? No. Do I hate it? No.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Build your own lamp
reviews.reviewText: This was interesting. I was not expecting to put my own lamp together. I have never seen something like this before. But it was really easy, and I didn't need the instructions. When I was finished it with, it didn't look too bad. It's not a high quality lamp, but it's not too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This is a really attractive little table lamp. The design of it seemed more like an oil rubbed bronze to me than a black, and I really liked that. I did opt to use our own lampshade on it though, because it fit our color scheme better. There's nothing wrong with the one included. I think it's a big plus that most table lamp sized lamp shades with a spider connector will fit the lamp. It takes a standard e26 bulb, and worked well with the smart bulb we wanted in it. The cord is ample but not overwhelming. I would guess six feet without measuring it. It is heavy enough that it shouldn't tip over or around, but light enough that you can carry it without strain. If you want to hit an intruder over the head with it like they do in the movies, I bet it would work well for you in that scenario.All said in done, this is a really nice lamp. We are grateful for it and would suggest it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but with personality
reviews.reviewText: This is a lamp meant for more of a small setting. It is smaller scale and worked great on a desk. I don't think it would be enough to illuminate a room. I like the dimensional pattern on the lamp base. It was enough to be interesting, but not so much that it created a competing color situation. The shade assembled fairly easily although I did have to tug the shade fabric snug along the 2 rings in order to get the velcro to connect once it was rolled all the way. I keep a small measuring tape near my desk. When I read the size of a particular item, I grab the tape measure and visualize what that measurement looks like in real life. I find that helpful so I am getting the right size item for the space it is intended AND so I am not surprised when something arrives.
